title: New growth in top stablecoin supply could signal a return of on-chain liquidity
description:
Quick Take The recent data analysis illuminates an intriguing trend: a return to growth in the supply of the top five stablecoins – USDT, USDC, BUSD, TUSD, and DAI – after a period of contraction. In the wake of the 2021 bull run, the aggregate supply of these stablecoins skyrocketed from a modest 25 billion […]

The post New growth in top stablecoin supply could signal a return of on-chain liquidity appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: ChainLight averts a potential $1.9B exploit in zkSync era protocol
description: In a world where blockchain security remains paramount, ChainLight, a top-tier blockchain security audit firm, uncovered a lurking threat in the zkSync Era protocol. This flaw, if manipulated, could have resulted in staggering losses upwards of $1.9 billion. This revelation underlines the importance of regular audits, collaborative efforts, and multi-layered security mechanisms in the blockchain ... Read more

title: AI Predicts Glaucoma Progression in High-Risk Patients with Remarkable Accuracy
description: Recent advancements in artificial intelligence (AI) have led to groundbreaking research in the field of ophthalmology. A new study published online in the British Journal of Ophthalmology reveals that AI trained to recognize red flags in retinal images and clinical information can predict the development of glaucoma in high-risk individuals with exceptional accuracy. This innovative ... Read more

title: Elon Musk Teases xAI’s New Chatbot ‘Grok’ to Compete with ChatGPT
description: In a recent update that has caught the attention of tech enthusiasts and industry experts alike, Elon Musk has provided a sneak peek into xAI’s latest venture – a chatbot named Grok. This new player in the AI field is poised to rival OpenAI’s ChatGPT, with a promise of delivering responses laced with humor and ... Read more

title: The Overwhelming Onslaught of AI Content Flood and Its Consequences
description: In the tumultuous world of artificial intelligence, a storm of discontent brews as Max Woolf, an industry veteran since 2015, raises a poignant concern about the alarming proliferation of lackluster AI content. Woolf’s recent blog post dissects the aftermath of an AI backlash-related burnout, shedding light on the staggering impact of Sturgeon’s Law, where ninety ... Read more

title: Epic Face-off: Ripple CEO and SEC Chair to Highlight DC Fintech Week
description: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse and SEC Chair Gary Gensler are scheduled to be guest speakers at the DC Fintech next week. Expected to cross paths, the crypto community has been sharing expectations that include criticism of the SEC from Ripple CEO. title: Vechain and Venum Brazil Join Forces for MMA Apparel and the Digital Economy – Report
description: VeChain partners with Venum Brazil for a tech-infused apparel collection, fusing blockchain, NFC, and NFT technologies to honor MMA legends and embrace digital innovation. The integration of VeChain’s technology into Venum Brazil’s unique apparel collection marks a step towards a “phygital” future where the physical and digital coexist. description:
